Detailed Description
Validates whether a given set of values falls within specified bounds.
This class is designed to check if a new set of parameters provided fits within the upper and lower bounds defined. It can be called with keyword arguments to perform the validation. Primarily useful in optimization problems or parameter validations where constraints on variable limits are required.
and lower (`lb`) bounds used for validation.

bounds boundsfcmaes.optimizer.CheckBounds fcmaes.optimizer.CheckBoundsbounds
fcmaes.optimizer.CheckBounds.bounds = bounds
The boundary constraints, containing the upper (ub)
The bounds object specifying spatial or defined boundaries.
Represents an object with defined bounds. This class encapsulates an object that requires bounds, likely for geometric or spatial calculations. It is initialized with a Bounds instance. The Bounds parameter describes the necessary spatial boundary details to construct the object.
